article_title: 10 healthcare quotes that define a busy 2015 in the industry
article_text:
2015 has seen some major developments in healthcare. The Supreme Court upheld Obamacare, ICD-10 took root, value-based reimbursement gained steam and the ongoing consumerism in healthcare continued to transform the industry. Here are some key quotes from the past year that not only tie in to the biggest news, but represent the kind of business intelligence that can help managers continue to move forward.

Advance to next slide to start gallery.

Images created by Betsy Caron
